actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act so as to clarify the meaning of the term "outpatient physical therapy services" insofar as such term includes speech pathology services provided by certain persons.

summary.text: Clarifies the meaning of the term "outpatient physical therapy services" under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act insofar as such term includes speech pathology services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act so as to clarify the meaning of the term "outpatient physical therapy services" insofar as such term includes speech pathology services provided by certain persons.
